title: Letters from Lockdown - Gaza, Myanmar, and at Sea
description: These people from all around the world share a common thread… this isn’t their first lockdown. During quarantine, Team Snap is bringing you pieces of wisdom, hope, and defiance. Season 11 - Episode 9
itunes:title: Letters from Lockdown - Gaza, Myanmar, and at Sea
itunes:subtitle: In other parts of the world, the concept of lockdown isn’t new at all — being forced to stay inside a room, a building, or a closed territory is a familiar experience. What can we learn from people who have been under lockdown before, whether in a war zo
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and PRX
itunes:summary: These people from all around the world share a common thread… this isn’t their first lockdown. During quarantine, Team Snap is bringing you pieces of wisdom, hope, and defiance. Season 11 - Episode 9
